title: cant watch replays
body:
i can download the replay but when i try to play it i get the message 
No suitable decoder module:
VLC does not support the audio or video format "undf". Unfortunately there is no way for you to fix this.

anyway i could get some help

replies.body: Are you downloading this replay from the client or a third party site?  You'll still need to break the replay into a highlight, per the [replay](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) guide.  You should then be able to drag it to your browser or another source to view the clip.  I hope that helps!

im downloading it from the client and i made a mistake in the title, i can watch replays but not highlights, but i just think its the player on my computer that cant run it dragging it into the browser works thanks
